alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nuckolls, southeastern Fillmore and northern Thayer Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 610 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deshler, or 23 miles north of Belleville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deshler around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hebron, Carleton, Bruning and Belvidere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
